product.title: Gimmie Loyalty Program
product.description: Gimmie Loyalty Program Setting for vBulletin

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase:
Input your Gimmie KEY
Get your own point system by signing up here.

Input your Gimmie Secret
Get your own point system by signing up here.
Trigger event when thread rating received
Enter the forum ID you want to trigger event. (leave blank to ignore)
Type all words you want to trigger event when exact words match in post or thread. Use commas to separate words. (leave blank to ignore)
Select the particular country you wish to lock rewards from.
Locale of reward content should display if available
Overide the CSS to change the layout of the widget.
Update the content to localize the widget
Enter HELP URL if you want to link the HELP button to a page
Override the CSS to change the layout of the widget.

setting.optioncode: <select name=\"setting[$setting[varname]]\" id=\"sel_setting_$setting[varname]\" tabindex=\"1\"> <option value=\"\" " . ($setting['value'] == '' ? 'selected="selected"' : '') .
